name: GPy
tagline: a Gaussian processes framework in python
body:
GPy
===
a Gaussian Process (GP) framework in python, from the Sheffield machine learning group. 

Gaussian processes underpin range of modern machine learning algorithms. In GPy, we've used python to implement a range of machine learning algorithms based on GPs. 

***

GPy is available under the BSD 3-clause license. We'd love to incorporate your changes, so fork us on [github](https://github.com/SheffieldML/GPy)!

GPy is hosted on the python package index [pypi](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/GPy/), so you can install with
    `pip install gpy`

***

You can read the online documentation for GPy here:
* [Online documentation](https://gpy.readthedocs.org/en/latest/)

Continuous integration status: ![CI status](https://travis-ci.org/SheffieldML/GPy.png)
